title: Unstable connection
body:
As yall know, riot have posted an inclient message; "Incompatibilities with Avast and AVG are causing players to disconnect from games. We recommend updating the virus definitions for these software since they have recently tuned their detection."

Despite the usual steps i get given, plus some other changes, my connection to the game is still iffy. And it seems to be JUST LoL. 
And yes, the antivirus has been updated. 
Usual ping is about 25-35 (the whole time), last couple weeks its been 59 - 600+ (600 on a good day).
